nodes.name: Grave

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback function. Adds `msg.value` to the sender's ether balance.
@notice Withdraw all funds from the contract. Funds cannot be incrementally withdrawn.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw all funds from the contract. Funds cannot be incrementally withdrawn.

userdoc.notice: Allows addresses to deposit their funds to be claimed at a later time. Used to safely hold ether released from a self-destructed contract.
